why do i always see myself relating to these words,this song, i think i'm so happy,and i swear sometimes i am!! but there is always something pulling me down and i feel like i can never totally be happy anymore, and i hate it!! can't i stop these horrible feelings!?these horrible thoughts?they're ruining my life,ruining my relationships,ruining everything.

It's like i have a hidden life,i always have,but yet now it seems like no one actually knows anything about the real me, ive gotten so good at hidding it,people ask me how i'm doing, "oh i'm great how are you" but why cant i just say"horrible,i never sleep i feel like i always want to throw up and sometimes i just want to end everything,how are yoU?" why can't i say that!? ohh probably because if i did people would think i'm even crazier than before. but honestly i dont care what anyone thinks anymore. I've realized the real true people that are there for me, the people that call me everyday just to say hi,but really i know they are checking up on me.
